p: The total count of molds and yeasts ranged from 1.02 ± 0.69 (clove essential oil) to 1.46 ± 0.53 log 10 CFU/mL (paraformaldehyde). No significant differences were observed ( P = 0.6544; CV = 37.59%; Figure 3) between any of the treatments. The low fungal load on the surface of the eggshells may be explained by the fact that the eggs were not exposed to a very humid environment on the farm ( Board and Tranter, 1995).
